Hello! How can I help you today?

The transfer duration can vary depending on various factors such as the currency you are sending, the country you are sending to, the payment method you choose, and the processing times of the recipient's bank. In general, most Wise transfers are completed within 1-4 working days. Some transfers can be completed within minutes if you are sending money to another Wise account in the same currency using the instant transfer feature.
